title: Roasted garlic soup
ingredients: ['4 bulbs garlic', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '6 tablespoons unsalted butter', '2 leeks, washed and chopped', '1 onion, chopped', '6 tablespoons plain flour', '1 litre chicken stock', '5 tablespoons sherry', '225ml single cream', '1 tablespoon lemon juice, or to taste', 'salt to taste', 'freshly ground pepper', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh chives']
